<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/102889</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205243</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Creating an Ethnic Student Newspaper</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Herstellen einer ethnischen 
Kursteilnehmer-Zeitung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Créer un journal ethnique d'étudiant</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Criando um jornal étnico do estudante</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Creazione del giornale etnico dell'allievo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δημιουργία μιας εθνικής εφημερίδας σπουδαστών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Crear un periódico étnico del estudiante</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">In this lesson students analyze news articles and features covered by ethnic newspapers in both the past and present. They will also have the opportunity to create a school newspaper. </string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <coverage>
            <string language="en">North America</string>
          </coverage>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In dieser Lektion analysieren Kursteilnehmer die 
Nachrichten Artikel und Merkmale, die durch ethnische Zeitungen in 
beidem letzten und anwesend umfaßt werden. Sie haben auch die 
Gelegenheit, eine Schulezeitung herzustellen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans cette leçon les étudiants analysent des 
articles et des dispositifs de nouvelles couverts par les journaux 
ethniques dans le les deux passé et présent. Ils auront 
également l'occasion de créer un journal d'école.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Nesta lição os estudantes analisam os artigos e 
as características da notícia cobertos por jornais étnicos em ambo 
o passado e atual. Terão também a oportunidade de criar um 
jornal da escola.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In questa lezione allievi analizzano gli articoli 
e le caratteristiche di notizie coperti dai giornali etnici 
nell'entrambi passato e presente. Egualmente avranno l'occasione
creare un giornale della scuola.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σε αυτό το μάθημα οι σπουδαστές αναλύουν τα άρθρα και
τα χαρακτηριστικά γνωρίσματα ειδήσεων που καλύπτονται από τις 
εθνικές εφημερίδες και στο παρελθόν και στο παρόν. Θα έχουν
επίσης την ευκαιρία να δημιουργήσουν μια σχολική εφημερίδα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En esta lección los estudiantes analizan los 
artículos y las características de las noticias cubiertos por los 
periódicos étnicos en el ambo último y presente. También 
tendrán la oportunidad de crear un periódico de la escuela.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205243</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>

        <educational>

        </educational>
        <rights>

            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>

            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>

        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
